an11.17:1.1: “Ekadasahi, bhikkhave, angehi samannagato gopalako abhabbo goganam pariharitum phatim katum.
an11.17:1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, gopalako na rupannu hoti, na lakkhanakusalo hoti, na asatikam hareta hoti, na vanam paticchadeta hoti, na dhumam katta hoti, na tittham janati, na pitam janati, na vithim janati, na gocarakusalo hoti, anavasesadohi ca hoti, ye te usabha gopitaro goparinayaka te na atirekapujaya pujeta hoti.
an11.17:1.4: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, ekadasahi angehi samannagato gopalako abhabbo goganam pariharitum phatim katum.
an11.17:2.1: Evamevam kho, bhikkhave, ekadasahi dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu abhabbo imasmim dhammavinaye vuddhim virulhim vepullam apajjitum.
an11.17:2.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na rupannu hoti, na lakkhanakusalo hoti, na asatikam hareta hoti, na vanam paticchadeta hoti, na dhumam katta hoti, na tittham janati, na pitam janati, na vithim janati, na gocarakusalo hoti, anavasesadohi ca hoti, ye te bhikkhu thera rattannu cirapabbajita sanghapitaro sanghaparinayaka te na atirekapujaya pujeta hoti.
an11.17:3.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na rupannu hoti?
an11.17:3.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yam kinci rupam (…) ‘cattari mahabhutani, catunnanca mahabhutanam upadayarupan’ti yathabhutam nappajanati.
an11.17:3.3: Evam kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na rupannu hoti.
an11.17:4.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na lakkhanakusalo hoti?
an11.17:4.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ‘kammalakkhano balo, kammalakkhano pandito’ti yathabhutam nappajanati.
an11.17:4.3: Evam kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na lakkhanakusalo hoti.
an11.17:5.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na asatikam hareta hoti?
an11.17:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu uppannam kamavitakkam adhivaseti nappajahati na vinodeti na byantikaroti na anabhavam gameti, uppannam byapadavitakkam … uppannam vihimsavitakkam …
an11.17:5.3: uppannuppanne papake akusale dhamme adhivaseti nappajahati na vinodeti na byantikaroti na anabhavam gameti.
an11.17:5.4: Evam kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na asatikam hareta hoti.
an11.17:6.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na vanam paticchadeta hoti?
an11.17:6.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu cakkhuna rupam disva nimittaggahi hoti anubyanjanaggahi;
an11.17:6.3: yatvadhikaranamenam cakkhundriyam asamvutam viharantam abhijjhadomanassa papaka akusala dhamma anvassaveyyum, tassa samvaraya na patipajjati; na rakkhati cakkhundriyam, cakkhundriye samvaram napajjati.
an11.17:6.8: manasa dhammam vinnaya nimittaggahi hoti anubyanjanaggahi;
an11.17:6.9: yatvadhikaranamenam manindriyam asamvutam viharantam abhijjhadomanassa papaka akusala dhamma anvassaveyyum, tassa samvaraya na patipajjati; na rakkhati manindriyam, manindriye samvaram napajjati.
an11.17:6.10: Evam kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na vanam paticchadeta hoti.
an11.17:7.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na dhumam katta hoti?
an11.17:7.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na yathasutam yathapariyattam dhammam vittharena paresam deseta hoti.
an11.17:7.3: Evam kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na dhumam katta hoti.
an11.17:8.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na tittham janati?
an11.17:8.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ye te bhikkhu bahussuta agatagama dhammadhara vinayadhara matikadhara, te kalena kalam upasankamitva na paripucchati na paripanhati:
an11.17:8.4: Tassa te ayasmanto avivatanceva na vivaranti, anuttanikatanca na uttanikaronti, anekavihitesu ca kankhathaniyesu dhammesu kankham na pativinodenti.
an11.17:8.5: Evam kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na tittham janati.
an11.17:9.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na pitam janati?
an11.17:9.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu tathagatappavedite dhammavinaye desiyamane na labhati atthavedam, na labhati dhammavedam, na labhati dhammupasamhitam pamojjam.
an11.17:9.3: Evam kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na pitam janati.
an11.17:10.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na vithim janati?
an11.17:10.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ariyam atthangikam maggam yathabhutam nappajanati.
an11.17:10.3: Evam kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na vithim janati.
an11.17:11.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na gocarakusalo hoti?
an11.17:11.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu cattaro satipatthane yathabhutam nappajanati.
an11.17:11.3: Evam kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na gocarakusalo hoti.
an11.17:12.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhum saddha gahapatika abhihatthum pavarenti civarapindapatasenasanagilanapaccayabhesajjaparikkharehi. Tatra bhikkhu mattam na janati patiggahanaya.
an11.17:12.3: Evam kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu anavasesadohi hoti.
an11.17:13.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ye te bhikkhu thera rattannu cirapabbajita sanghapitaro sanghaparinayaka, te na atirekapujaya pujeta hoti?
an11.17:13.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ye te bhikkhu thera rattannu cirapabbajita sanghapitaro sanghaparinayaka, tesu na mettam kayakammam paccupatthapeti avi ceva raho ca, na mettam vacikammam … na mettam manokammam paccupatthapeti avi ceva raho ca.
an11.17:13.3: Evam kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ye te bhikkhu thera rattannu cirapabbajita sanghapitaro sanghaparinayaka, na te atirekapujaya pujeta hoti.
